articles.title: Top 5 viral videos of the week, woman dances to Kacha Badam on roadside to Ukrainian refugee kids’ first day at school - India Today
articles.description: So, if your time went on prepping for Holi this week and you couldn’t keep up with the videos which trended furiously online, we have got you covered. We have compiled some of the best videos online and we are quite sure that you are going to like them.

articles.title: Sara Khan reveals ex-hubby Ali Merchant cheated on her with spa worker, says, 'this is extreme' - India Today
articles.description: In the recent episode of Lock Upp, actress Sara Khan revealed that her ex-husband Ali Merchant cheated on her with a spa worker. The actress also opened up about how long it took her to move on.

articles.title: Bloody Brothers Review: Unfailingly Watchable Because Of Jaideep Ahlawat And Mod Zeeshan Ayyub - NDTV Movies
articles.description: Bloody Brothers Review: A thriller that shuns the usual trappings of the genre. No blowouts, no gunfights, no chases, no heavy-handed confrontations - it thrives on sustained restraint.

articles.title: James box office collection Day 1: Puneeth Rajkumar's film takes historic opening - India Today
articles.description: Puneeth Rajkumar's James took a historic opening. Reportedly, the film earned a whopping Rs 15 crore at the box office on its opening day.
